helpgrid.innerhtml: You can add multiple reserved items to the current usage line.
Select one or more items to add to the current usage line.

One or more reservations have similar details to the current inventory usage line. You can select a reservation to reference on the inventory usage line. To keep the quantity specified on the inventory usage line, select Keep Current Quantity.

One or more previous issue transactions have similar details to the current return usage line. You can select an issue to reference on the inventory usage line. To keep the quantity specified on the inventory usage line, select Keep Current Quantity.

One or more reservations exist with similar details to the inventory usage line. If applicable, select a reservation to reference on the inventory usage line. To maintain the quantity entered on the inventory usage line, select the Keep Current Quantity box. If left unchecked, the quantity is updated to the remaining reserved quantity.

One or more of the previous issue transactions exist with similar details to the return line. If applicable, select an issue to reference on the inventory usage line. To maintain the quantity entered on the inventory usage line, select the Keep Current Quantity box. If left unchecked, the quantity is updated to the remaining unreturned quantity.
You can check whether the details that are entered for a new record match any existing reservation and return records.

radiobutton.label: Use the default stage bin for each inventory item
Enter a new stage bin number for use by all rows that will be staged
Use the default stage bin for each inventory item
Enter a new stage bin number for use by all rows that will be staged

helpgrid.innerhtml: The quantity requested exceeds the bin's current balance. Select multiple bins to source items from, or specify rotating assets for the current usage line. You can click Auto-Split to automatically select the additional bins or rotating assets.
